Interface IPRange

All Known Implementing Classes:
IPv4IntervalRange, IPv4MaskRange, IPv6IntervalRange, IPv6MaskRange
public interface IPRange

An interface that represents an IP range.

Method Summary
 boolean isInRange(IPAddress address)
          Checks if given IP is in this range.
 

Method Detail

isInRange

boolean isInRange(IPAddress address)
Checks if given IP is in this range.

Parameters:
address - the IP address to check
Returns:
true if in range, false if not
